dict.string: if test \! -e "$TM_NEW_FILE"; then sed -e "/\${TM_NEW_FILE_BASENAME}/s//${TM_NEW_FILE_BASENAME}/" \ -e "/\${TM_USERNAME}/s//`niutil -readprop / /users/\$USER realname`/" \ -e "/\${TM_YEAR}/s//`date +%Y`/" \ -e "/\${TM_DATE}/s//`date +%Y-%m-%d`/" \ -e "/\${TM_ORGANIZATION_NAME}/s//${TM_ORGANIZATION_NAME}/" \ NewPythonScript.py > "$TM_NEW_FILE" fi
